QuestData.Title: Home... Gone... Naga...
QuestData.Description: <The murloc struggles to speak your language.>$b$bRockpool... attacked. Naga turn, take village, villagers.$b$bSalt-Flop escape, but others do not. Go south, talk to Chief Neptool. Maybe he survive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Salt-Flop has asked you to speak with Chief Neptool of the Rockpool murlocs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Neptool at the Red Reaches in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: <The murloc spirit looks upon you sadly.>$b$bSalt-Flop did not shame himself by running away. Look behind me, and see for yourself.$b$bThe Rockpool had no hope against the naga's attack.
